sentences.sContent: If it rains, I won’t go cycling.
sentences.sCn: 如果下雨，我就不去骑车了。

sentences.sContent: What do you do on Monday? I go cycling.
sentences.sContent_eng: What do you do on Monday? I go cycling.
sentences.sCn: 你星期一做什么？ 我去骑自行车。

sentences.sContent: B: If I go cycling, I'll be tired by the evening.
sentences.sContent_eng: B: If I go cycling, I'll be tired by the evening.
sentences.sCn: 如果我去骑车的话，晚上我肯定会很累了。
